verbs.description: [ARG0: The United States] [V: invades] [ARG1: the US Virgin Islands] . Why did President Trump order it ?
The United States invades the US Virgin Islands . Why [V: did] President Trump order it ?
The United States invades the US Virgin Islands . [ARGM-CAU: Why] did [ARG0: President Trump] [V: order] [ARG1: it] ?
